+class InvertableBoltzmannTransform(Transform):
+    """

+    then normalizing. Note that dimensionality of `y.dim() == x.dim() + 1`.
body: I think the dimensionality change will violate an assumption in `test_distributions.py`, so you'll need special handling when adding `InvertableBoltzmannTransform` to the tests.
